title: Breadth-First Search
description: In this two part challenge, I implement the Breadth-First Search algorithm in JavaScript. My demo application is "6 Degrees of Kevin Bacon" (finding the closest relationship between Kevin Bacon and another actor).

timestamps.title: Introducing today's topic:  Breadth First Search
Attach a method to the graph object using prototype
Determine whether actor node already exists
Add end and start node to graph object
Write the code for the breadth first search algorithm

codeExamples.title: Breadth-First Search
codeExamples.description: This sketch implements the breadth first search algorithm.
